files.patch:
@@ -473,0 +473,6 @@
+  // Stop the WatcherThread. We do this before disenrolling various
+  // PeriodicTasks to reduce the likelihood of races.
+  WatcherThread::stop();
+
+  NativeHeapTrimmer::cleanup();
+
@@ -484,6 +490,0 @@

-  // PeriodicTasks to reduce the likelihood of races.
-  WatcherThread::stop();
-
-  NativeHeapTrimmer::cleanup();
